member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.BaseAnimationConverter
member.summary:
Represents an that is used in s' animations. This converter serves as a base class for generation of animations delays to achieve effects like "sequential" animations of the items, i.e. each item to begin animating after the previous one's animation has begun or finished.
For more information see and .

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.BaseAnimationConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Generates the delay that is to be applied for the provided item's animation.
member.param: Item whose animations' delay is required.
The type of the binding target property.
The delay that is to be applied for the second item.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value. If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.BaseAnimationConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: This method is not implemented as inverse conversion is not needed.
member.param: The value that is produced by the binding target.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value. If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.

member.returns: The object which is to be returned by the converter.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.DelayConverter
member.summary:
Represents an that is used in ChartItems' animations. This converter generates animations delays to enable "sequential" animations of the items, i.e. each item to begin animating after the previous one's animation has begun or finished.
For more information see .

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.Axis.AddRange(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds the specified range of axis values. The property must be set to false prior to calling this method, otherwise it will result in no-op.
member.remarks: This is the preferred approach for manual axis range creation as it updates all range values in an atomic operation and avoids the performance overhead of separate processing of the , , and values (when set through the respective properties).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.AxisX.StepLabelLevelCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of levels (steps) that will be used to distribute the axis item labels.
member.remarks: If you set this property to 2, the first item label will be placed on first level, the second - on second level, the third - on the first level, etc.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.AxisX.StepLabelLevelHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of each step label level (row).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.AxisX.ShouldScaleStepOnZoom
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the axis step value should be preserved or scaled down whenever zooming action occurs.
member.remarks: The default value is true (i.e. the step will be scaled down). This property is applicable only for scenarios with manual axis range and is generally combined with AxisX.ShouldRoundMinValueOnZoom property in order to achieve constant mapping between series items and axis ticks in zoom / scroll scenarios (set ShouldScaleStepOnZoom = false and ShouldRoundMinValueOnZoom = true).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.AxisX.ShouldRoundMinValueOnZoom
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the axis MinValue should be rounded or not whenever zooming action occurs.
member.remarks: The default value is false (i.e. it will not be rounded). This property is applicable only for scenarios with manual axis range and is generally combined with AxisX.ShouldRoundMinValueOnZoom property in order to achieve constant mapping between series items and axis ticks in zoom / scroll scenarios (set ShouldScaleStepOnZoom = false and ShouldRoundMinValueOnZoom = true).

member.summary: Determines the level of interactivity processed by the chart control.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.InteractivityScope.None
member.summary: User interactivity is disabled (hover / select effects will not be applied).

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.InteractivityScope.Item
member.summary: User interactivity is processed on series item level (i.e. clicking / hovering an item will select / highlight only the single item).
member.remarks: This enumeration value is not applicable to self-drawing series types like Line, Spline, Area (and all of their derivatives).

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.InteractivityScope.Series
member.summary: User interactivity is processed on series level (i.e. clicking / hovering an item will select / highlight all items in its respective series).
member.remarks: This enumeration value is not applicable to Pie and Doughnut series types.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadChart
member.summary: RadChart is a powerful data visualization control that allows you to display various 2D and 3D chart series types. The control can be easily customized via control templates, provides databinding support, display animations out-of-the-box, and supports one or multiple ChartAreas in order to display multiple categories of data at the same time.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadChart.CreateItemStyleDelegate
member.summary:
Gets or sets a delegate that allows you to generate a new user defined to be applied to a number of chart items.
The delegate accepts four parameters:
First parameter is a instance that represents the chart item that is currently processed. This could be either a derivative of , or a derivative of , or a , or a .
Second parameter is the that would be applied to the respective chart item by default. You can use it to set the Style.BasedOn property of the user defined style you are generating.
Third parameter is the respective associated with the chart item. Note that argument will be null if the chart item is a .
Fourth parameter is the respective associated with the chart item.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadChart.SeriesMappings
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of mappings that defines the relations between the data passed to the chart and the chart series fields (YValue, XValue, etc.) that should be bound to the passed data.
member.remarks: You need to add a separate mapping item for each chart series that you would like to display in the chart control.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadChart.UseDefaultLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the default layout of the charting control should be used.
member.remarks: You should set this property to false if you would like to customize the layout of the control entirely through the Content property of the control. Alternatively you can overwrite the control template and change the default layout there, or use a combination of the default layout (from the template) and layout specified in the Content property of the control.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.DimensionModeConverter.Convert(System.Object[],System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts source values to a value for the binding target. The data binding engine calls this method when it propagates the values from source bindings to the binding target.
member.param: The array of values that the source bindings in the produces. The value indicates that the source binding has no value to provide for conversion.
The type of the binding target property.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value.If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.A return value of . indicates that the converter did not produce a value, and that the binding will use the if it is available, or else will use the default value.A return value of . indicates that the binding does not transfer the value or use the or the default value.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.DimensionModeConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type[],System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a binding target value to the source binding values.
member.param: The value that the binding target produces.
The array of types to convert to. The array length indicates the number and types of values that are suggested for the method to return.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: An array of values that have been converted from the target value back to the source values.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.CameraExtension
member.summary: This extension class provides zooming and rotation interactivity for 3D charts out-of-the-box.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.ChartExtension
member.summary: Provides the base class for the extensibility mechanism supported by RadChart.
member.remarks: The extensibility mechanism implements the IExtensibleObject / IExtension pattern. Each custom extension must inherit from the Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.ChartExtension class. You can add custom control extensions on the ChartArea level via the ChartArea.Extensions collection property.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.ChartExtension.Attach(Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.ChartArea)
member.summary: Enables an extension object to find out when it has been aggregated. Called when the extension is added to the ChartArea.Extensions collection property.
member.param: The ChartArea object whose Extensions collection is being modified (new extension added).

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.ChartExtension.Detach(Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.ChartArea)
member.summary: Enables an object to find out when it is no longer aggregated. Called when an extension is removed from the ChartArea.Extensions collection property.
member.param: The ChartArea object whose Extensions collection is being modified (extension removed).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.ChartExtension.Owners
member.summary: Gets the collection of ChartArea instances that are associated with the chart extension.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CameraExtension class.

member.summary: Enables an extension object to find out when it has been aggregated. Called when the extension is added to the ChartArea.Extensions collection property.
member.param: The ChartArea object whose Extensions collection is being modified (new extension added).

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.CameraExtension.Detach(Telerik.Windows.Controls.Charting.ChartArea)

member.param: The ChartArea object whose Extensions collection is being modified (extension removed).
